    • initialize

      Specified by:

    • handleSave

      public void handleSave(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Assigning values to id, name, stock, max, and min depending on the user's input. The system checks for type mismatches and sends an error message if a mismatch has occurred. The values of min and max are also checked to make sure that min is less than max. If OutSourced is selected, a new Outsource object is created and added to allParts and companyName is prompted and initialized. If In-House is selected, a new InHouse object is created and added to allParts and machineId is prompted, converted to an integer and then initialized.
      Parameters:
      event - - User clicks the save button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • handleAddPartInHouse
